name: Am I alone in this room?
name_original: Am I alone in this room?
description:
Am I alone in this room is game about exploring one room, where strange things are happening.

You are locked up in one room. Explore this room to get one of seven endings. I wish you good luck.

This game was made for A Dark Room game jam, it was my third Game Jam. The theme was only one room. Game still has some bugs, but I hope you will atleast like the core mechanic of the game.

Everything in the game (except A Dark Room logo) is created by me in limit of 2 weeks.

Reviews and suggestions are welcomed!

By: RabbitDev
